# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity generation structure at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt structure at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a constant fuel supply to avoid EntityStatus.NO_FUEL errors.
- Regularly check the fuel levels of entities that require fuel to function.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid to avoid EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED errors.
- Regularly check the connections of entities that require a power connection to function.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a constant supply of source items to avoid EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS errors.
- Regularly check the inventory levels of entities that require source items to function.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network to avoid EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK errors.
- Regularly check the connections of entities that require an electric network connection to function.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have a constant supply of ingredients to avoid EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS errors.
- Regularly check the inventory levels of entities that require ingredients to function.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
